mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE memID = #{memID}
SELECT memPW FROM member WHERE memID = #{memID}
SELECT memID FROM member WHERE memName = #{memName} AND memEmail = #{memEmail} AND memHP = #{memHP}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memId, memPwd, memNickName, memName, memGen, memBirth, memEmail, memHP, memZipcode, memAddress1, memAddress2) VALUES(#{memId},#{memPwd},#{memNickName},#{memName},#{memGen},#{memBirth},#{memEmail},#{memHP},#{memZipcode},#{memAddress1},#{memAddress2})
mapper.select: SELECT memId FROM member WHERE memId=#{memId}
SELECT memNickName FROM member WHERE memNickName=#{memNickName}
